conversation:
[Message 1] Chloe: "Hey Liam, did you hear about what happened at the Art Gallery?"
[Message 2] Liam: "Yeah, crazy. Heard it was someone named 5.  Corrections Officer. Awful."
[Message 3] Marcus: "Terrible news. My heart goes out to their family."
[Message 4] Chloe: "I know! I was just there yesterday looking at paintings."
[Message 5] Liam: "We were all there, last week. What a waste."
[Message 6] Marcus: "Speaking of art, Chloe, did you finish that commission for Mrs. Davison?"
[Message 7] Chloe: "Almost! Just need to put the final touches on it. You going to the farmer's market this weekend?"
[Message 8] Liam: "Probably not. Got some stuff to catch up on around the house."
[Message 9] Marcus: "Same here. Maybe next week."
[Message 10] Chloe: "Did anyone know 5.  Corrections Officer well?"
[Message 11] Liam: "Not really. Just saw them around. They were quiet."
[Message 12] Marcus: "I knew them a bit better, through the art circle. Always seemed creative. Sad."
[Message 13] Chloe: "So sad. The police are investigating everyone who was at the gallery recently, right?"
[Message 14] Liam: "Yeah, they interviewed me yesterday. Just routine, I guess."
[Message 15] Marcus: "Me too. Asked about my whereabouts Late Evening."
[Message 16] Chloe: "Late Evening? That's when it happened?"
[Message 17] Liam: "Apparently."
[Message 18] Marcus: "I was home, watching TV. Alone."
[Message 19] Chloe: "I was at Sarah's birthday dinner. Lots of witnesses."
[Message 20] Liam: "Lucky you."
[Message 21] Chloe: "Guys, this is freaking me out. What if they never find who did it?"
[Message 22] Marcus: "They will. The police here are pretty good."
[Message 23] Liam: "Hope so. Justice for 5.  Corrections Officer."
[Message 24] Chloe: "Amen to that. What did the police ask you, Liam?"
[Message 25] Liam: "Just the usual. Where I was, if I knew 5.  Corrections Officer, etc. Nothing exciting."
[Message 26] Marcus: "Same here. They seemed interested in my connection to 5.  Corrections Officer’s work."
[Message 27] Chloe: "Why?"
[Message 28] Marcus: "Apparently, 5.  Corrections Officer thought I was stealing ideas from their art."
[Message 29] Liam: "Seriously? Drama."
[Message 30] Chloe: "Wow, I didn't know that."
[Message 31] Marcus: "It was nothing. Just some artistic differences. Definitely didn't intend any harm to 5.  Corrections Officer."
[Message 32] Liam: "Still, I'd be careful. The police might see that as a motive."
[Message 33] Marcus: "I know, I know. It's just... frustrating. This whole thing is."
[Message 34] Chloe: "Frustrating is an understatement. Scary is more like it. Has anyone talked to Kai?"
[Message 35] Liam: "Kai? Why would we talk to Kai?"
[Message 36] Chloe: "I saw Kai at the art gallery Late Evening, talking to 5.  Corrections Officer. He looked angry."
[Message 37] Marcus: "Oh really? I didn't see that."
[Message 38] Liam: "Me neither. Kai always has a temper, though."
[Message 39] Chloe: "Maybe the police should talk to him."
[Message 40] Marcus: "Yeah, maybe. Anyway, I gotta run. Painting deadline looming. Talk later."
[Message 41] Liam: "Later, Marcus."
[Message 42] Chloe: "Bye, Marcus."
[Message 43] Chloe: "Liam, are you sure you didn't see Kai?"
[Message 44] Liam: "Positive. I left the gallery way before Late Evening. Had dinner with my mom."
[Message 45] Chloe: "Okay. Just seems weird he wasn't mentioned yet."
[Message 46] Liam: "He's probably just laying low. Doesn't want to get involved."
[Message 47] Chloe: "Maybe. I’m going to sleep now. Goodnight."
[Message 48] Liam: "Night."
[Message 49] Marcus: "Hey, guys, sorry I disappeared. Something came up."
[Message 50] Chloe: "No worries. Anything serious?"
[Message 51] Marcus: "Nah, just a family thing. Back to painting now. This deadline is killing me."
[Message 52] Liam: "Good luck with that. Still thinking about 5.  Corrections Officer. They were so young."
[Message 53] Chloe: "I know, it's just... senseless."
[Message 54] Marcus: "Absolutely. A real tragedy."
[Message 55] Liam: "Hey, Chloe, did you ever find that Strangulation with a rope you were looking for for your macrame project?"
[Message 56] Chloe: "Yeah, I did, thanks! Found a great one at the craft store. Why?"
[Message 57] Liam: "No reason. Just remembered you mentioning it."
[Message 58] Chloe: "Odd thing to remember during this chaos."
[Message 59] Marcus: "He’s probably just trying to keep things light."
[Message 60] Liam: "Exactly. I was trying to lighten the mood. Seriously, though, what if the police suspect one of us?"
[Message 61] Chloe: "Don't even say that! We're all friends here."
[Message 62] Marcus: "Yeah, Liam, that's not cool. We’re all in shock."
[Message 63] Liam: "Sorry, sorry. Just paranoid, I guess."
[Message 64] Chloe: "I get it. Me too."
[Message 65] Marcus: "Anyone hear anything new from the police?"
[Message 66] Liam: "Nothing. Still quiet on my end."
[Message 67] Chloe: "Same here. I did see Kai downtown today. He looked really nervous."
[Message 68] Marcus: "Hmm. Interesting."
[Message 69] Liam: "Maybe you should tell the police that, Chloe."
[Message 70] Chloe: "I will if they ask. Don't want to jump to conclusions."
[Message 71] Marcus: "Good call. Let them do their job."
[Message 72] Liam: "True. I wonder if 5.  Corrections Officer had any enemies. Maybe someone from their workplace?"
[Message 73] Chloe: "Possible. Seems like a dangerous job."
[Message 74] Marcus: "I don’t know. I heard 5.  Corrections Officer was planning to expose a secret about someone at the gallery."
[Message 75] Chloe: "Whoa. That changes things."
[Message 76] Liam: "Now THAT'S a motive. Who would they expose?"
[Message 77] Marcus: "I don't know. But I overheard them talking about it on the phone. Sounded serious."
[Message 78] Chloe: "Maybe that's what Kai was angry about Late Evening? He knew?"
[Message 79] Liam: "Possible. Or maybe Marcus is just trying to shift the blame since he and 5.  Corrections Officer argued about art."
[Message 80] Marcus: "Hey! That’s uncalled for. I would never…"
[Message 81] Chloe: "Okay, guys, let's not turn on each other. This is exactly what the police want."
[Message 82] Liam: "You're right. Sorry, Marcus. Just stressed."
[Message 83] Marcus: "Apology accepted. I’m stressed too. Just... let's focus on finding out the truth."
[Message 84] Chloe: "Agreed. Has anyone checked 5.  Corrections Officer's social media?"
[Message 85] Liam: "Good idea. I'll take a look."
[Message 86] Marcus: "Me too. Maybe they posted something hinting at who they were going to expose."
[Message 87] Chloe: "Okay, report back if you find anything."
[Message 88] Liam: "Will do. This is all so messed up. Poor 5.  Corrections Officer."
[Message 89] Marcus: "Hey, quick question, Liam. You said you had dinner with your mom that night? Did she see you all night?"
[Message 90] Liam: "Yeah, why?"
[Message 91] Marcus: "Just curious. My mom always remembers every detail. Thought she could be a witness."
[Message 92] Liam: "She wasn't paying that much attention. We just watched TV. What’s with all the questions, Marcus? You acting weird."
[Message 93] Chloe: "Yeah Marcus, chill out."
[Message 94] Marcus: "Sorry, just trying to help the police. I thought that if you weren't there during the time, then that would clear things up."
[Message 95] Liam: "I get it. It's just... this is making me nervous."
[Message 96] Chloe: "Me too. Let's just try to stay calm and cooperate with the police."
[Message 97] Marcus: "Agreed. Hey, has anyone thought about the fact that whoever did this could get the death penalty? Insane!"
[Message 98] Liam: "Whoa, slow down, Marcus. Don't jump to conclusions. We don't even know who did it yet."
[Message 99] Chloe: "Exactly. One step at a time. I'm going to log off now. Too much."
[Message 100] Liam: "Yeah, me too. Talk later."

[Message 1] Marcus: Found anything good today?
[Message 2] Sarah: Not really. Just browsing. You?
[Message 3] Tom: Usual junk. Someone's gotta buy it, right?
[Message 4] Emily: Yeah, that's the flea market spirit.
[Message 5] Marcus: Saw some interesting... tech over by stall 42.
[Message 6] Sarah: Tech? Like what kind?
[Message 7] Tom: Old radios, probably. Or busted TVs.
[Message 8] Marcus: Maybe. Maybe not.
[Message 9] Emily: Depends on what you're looking for.
[Message 10] Sarah: Stall 42, huh? I might check that out.
[Message 11] Marcus: Don't say I didn't warn you.
[Message 12] Tom: What's that supposed to mean?
[Message 13] Marcus: Exactly what I said.
[Message 14] Emily: He's just being cryptic. Ignore him.
[Message 15] Sarah: Cryptic like...?
[Message 16] Marcus: Like, maybe the stuff isn't exactly... above board.
[Message 17] Tom: Now hold on a minute...
[Message 18] Emily: Tom, just... let it go.
[Message 19] Sarah: Above board in what way? Did you see something?
[Message 20] Marcus: I saw enough.
[Message 21] Emily: He probably just means it's overpriced.
[Message 22] Sarah: Maybe. But something feels off.
[Message 23] Tom: You always think something feels off, Sarah.
[Message 24] Marcus: Let her think what she wants.
[Message 25] Emily: So, anything else interesting today, besides Marcus's paranoia?
[Message 26] Tom: Found a cool vintage lighter. Nothing crazy.
[Message 27] Sarah: Lighters are cool. Practical, too.
[Message 28] Marcus: Practical for some things.
[Message 29] Emily: Marcus!
[Message 30] Tom: What's with you today? You on edge?
[Message 31] Marcus: Just... observant.
[Message 32] Sarah: Observant of...?
[Message 33] Marcus: Things. Events. Circumstances.
[Message 34] Emily: Right. Well, I'm going to get some coffee. Anyone want anything?
[Message 35] Tom: Black coffee for me, thanks.
[Message 36] Sarah: I'll come with you. Need to stretch my legs.
[Message 37] Marcus: Sounds good.
[Message 38] Emily: Okay, be back in a bit.
[Message 39] Sarah: Coming, Emily.
[Message 40] Marcus: (To Tom) So, you gonna ask?
[Message 41] Tom: Ask what? Don't play dumb.
[Message 42] Marcus: I'm not playing anything.
[Message 43] Tom: About stall 42. You know.
[Message 44] Marcus: Why would I know anything about stall 42?
[Message 45] Tom: Because you just implied... things.
[Message 46] Marcus: Maybe I was wrong. Maybe I saw things that weren't there.
[Message 47] Tom: Bull. You saw something. What?
[Message 48] Marcus: Just... some guys moving stuff. Quickly.
[Message 49] Tom: Moving what stuff?
[Message 50] Marcus: Doesn't matter. It's done.
[Message 51] Tom: Done how? Done what?
[Message 52] Marcus: Look, I don't want to talk about it, okay?
[Message 53] Tom: Fine. But if something shady went down...
[Message 54] Marcus: Just drop it, Tom. Seriously.
[Message 55] Emily: (Returning) Coffee's here!
[Message 56] Sarah: (Returning) Smells good.
[Message 57] Tom: Thanks, Emily.
[Message 58] Marcus: Appreciate it.
[Message 59] Emily: So, stall 42... still a mystery?
[Message 60] Marcus: Forget about it.
[Message 61] Sarah: Easy for you to say.
[Message 62] Tom: Yeah, some of us are curious.
[Message 63] Marcus: Curiosity killed the cat.
[Message 64] Emily: Okay, enough with the riddles.
[Message 65] Sarah: Did you say something about moving things fast?
[Message 66] Marcus: It was nothing. Really.
[Message 67] Tom: Yeah, just a couple of guys... unloading... something.
[Message 68] Emily: Sounds…normal?
[Message 69] Sarah: I don't know. I still feel like something happened.
[Message 70] Marcus: Look, I’ll handle the cleanup. Just… drop it.

[Message 1] Ben: "That’s not our usual route."
[Message 2] Chloe: "Huh. Guess not."
[Message 3] Mark: "Maybe a detour?"
[Message 4] Ben: "Detour for what?"
[Message 5] Chloe: "Don't start, Ben."
[Message 6] Ben: "Just saying..."
[Message 7] Mark: "They said it'd be different."
[Message 8] Chloe: "Different how?"
[Message 9] Mark: "You know..."
[Message 10] Ben: "No, I don't 'know'."
[Message 11] Chloe: "Lay off him, Ben."
[Message 12] Ben: "Someone has to ask the questions."
[Message 13] Mark: "It's just...circumstances."
[Message 14] Chloe: "Right. Circumstances."
[Message 15] Ben: "Circumstances that put us here."
[Message 16] Mark: "We all agreed, didn't we?"
[Message 17] Chloe: "Agreed to what, exactly?"
[Message 18] Ben: "To the 'circumstances'."
[Message 19] Mark: "It was for the best. Really."
[Message 20] Chloe: "I hope so."
[Message 21] Ben: "Best for who?"
[Message 22] Chloe: "Ben, seriously..."
[Message 23] Mark: "Enough. Just...enough."
[Message 24] Ben: "Fine. Whatever."
[Message 25] Chloe: "Bus is late."
[Message 26] Mark: "Always is."
[Message 27] Ben: "Like clockwork."
[Message 28] Chloe: "You think...they know?"
[Message 29] Mark: "Know what?"
[Message 30] Chloe: "You know..."
[Message 31] Ben: "If they did, we wouldn't be standing here."
[Message 32] Mark: "Don't say that."
[Message 33] Chloe: "He's probably right."
[Message 34] Ben: "I usually am."
[Message 35] Mark: "Let's just...drop it."
[Message 36] Chloe: "Okay. Drop it."
[Message 37] Ben: "Too late to drop anything."
[Message 38] Mark: "God, Ben..."
[Message 39] Chloe: "Look, here's the bus."
[Message 40] Ben: "Finally."
[Message 41] Mark: "Let's just get on."
[Message 42] Chloe: "Right. Let's go."
[Message 43] Ben: "Wonder where *it's* headed tonight."
[Message 44] Mark: "Don't."
[Message 45] Chloe: "Just get on the bus, Ben."
[Message 46] Ben: "Fine, fine."
[Message 47] Mark: "..."

[Message 1] Alex: Hey everyone! How's the dog park treating you all tonight?
[Message 2] Jamie: Pretty good, Alex! Just got here. My pup, Buster, is already making friends.
[Message 3] River: Wee hours at the park is the best! Less crowded.
[Message 4] Alex: Agreed, River! Jamie, that's awesome. My golden, Leo, is being a goofball as usual.
[Message 5] Jamie: Leo sounds adorable. Buster is part Beagle, so he's mostly nose-to-the-ground.
[Message 6] River: Haha! Typical Beagle. Speaking of, I have a doctor's appointment tomorrow. Wish me luck!
[Message 7] Alex: Good luck, River! Everything alright?
[Message 8] River: Routine checkup. But you know how it is, always a little nerve-wracking.
[Message 9] Jamie: Understandable. Hope it goes well! Hey, has anyone been following that debate about standardized testing in schools?
[Message 10] Alex: I've seen a few articles pop up. Seems pretty heated. What are your thoughts, Jamie?
[Message 11] Jamie: I'm torn. On one hand, standardized tests seem like a decent way to gauge student performance. But on the other hand, they put so much pressure on kids and teachers.
[Message 12] River: I agree. I think it stifles creativity and focuses too much on rote memorization.
[Message 13] Alex: Definitely. My cousin's a teacher, and she says it's basically teaching to the test now. No room for exploring other subjects.
[Message 14] Jamie: Exactly! It's like, what happened to the joy of learning?
[Message 15] River: Seriously! When I was younger, I loved science experiments. Now it's all about bubbling in the right answer.
[Message 16] Alex: Remember making volcanoes in elementary school? Classic!
[Message 17] Jamie: Oh yeah! Baking soda and vinegar explosion! Good times.
[Message 18] River: So much mess. So much fun.
[Message 19] Alex: Back to education… maybe there's a better way to assess students. Portfolio-based assessments, perhaps?
[Message 20] Jamie: I've heard good things about those. More holistic, right?
[Message 21] River: Definitely shows a broader range of skills and understanding. Photography classes use that method a lot.
[Message 22] Alex: That makes sense, River. Thinking outside the box is key.
[Message 23] Jamie: It just feels like we're failing a lot of kids by focusing solely on standardized tests.
[Message 24] Alex: Agreed. Especially those who learn differently.
[Message 25] River: Absolutely. Everyone learns at their own pace and in their own way.
[Message 26] Jamie: So true. Okay, I'm stepping off my soapbox now! Sorry for the rant!
[Message 27] Alex: No worries, Jamie! It's an important topic.
[Message 28] River: Yeah, we all feel the same way. Just wish there was an easy solution.
[Message 29] Alex: If only! Hey, anyone got any fun plans for the weekend?
[Message 30] Jamie: I'm thinking of catching a baseball game. The weather should be nice.
[Message 31] River: Ooh, that sounds fun! I might try to hit up a new photography exhibit downtown.
[Message 32] Alex: Nice! I'm probably going to try and learn a new song on my guitar.
[Message 33] Jamie: Cool! What kind of music do you play, Alex?
[Message 34] Alex: Mostly acoustic stuff. Folk, some indie rock.
[Message 35] River: Awesome! I love live music. Nashville, after all!
[Message 36] Jamie: Oh, I saw a cool documentary about educational reform in Finland. Worth checking out, if you're still on that topic, haha.
[Message 37] Alex: Finland always gets brought up when talking about education. I'll look it up! Thanks, Jamie.
[Message 38] River: Adding it to my watchlist.
[Message 39] Alex: It's getting late. Leo's starting to get antsy.
[Message 40] Jamie: Buster's getting sleepy too. Probably ready for a belly rub.
[Message 41] River: Time to head home for me as well. Good luck at your appointment tomorrow, River!
[Message 42] Alex: Ditto! Good luck, River.
[Message 43] River: Thanks, guys! Appreciate it.
[Message 44] Jamie: No problem! Good night, everyone!
[Message 45] Alex: Night, Jamie! Night, River!
[Message 46] River: Night, Alex! Night, Jamie!
[Message 47] Jamie: Oh, before I forget, did you all see that crazy sunset earlier? Perfect for a photoshoot, River!
[Message 48] River: I missed it! Darn it.
[Message 49] Alex: It was pretty spectacular. Maybe you can catch one tomorrow night!
[Message 50] Jamie: Yep! They're supposed to be even better.
[Message 51] River: I'll keep an eye out! Thanks for the heads up.
[Message 52] Alex: No problem!
[Message 53] Jamie: Alright, seriously heading home now.
[Message 54] Alex: Have a good night!
[Message 55] River: Sweet dreams!

[Message 1] Liam: "Beautiful sunset, huh?"
[Message 2] Maya: "It is. Calming."
[Message 3] Liam: "Needed it."
[Message 4] Maya: "Me too. Big time."
[Message 5] Liam: "So... about this thing?"
[Message 6] Maya: "The... beach?"
[Message 7] Liam: "Yeah, the beach. This whole... trip."
[Message 8] Maya: "Right."
[Message 9] Liam: "Are you... sure?"
[Message 10] Maya: "Positive. Checked everything."
[Message 11] Liam: "And?"
[Message 12] Maya: "Gone. Poof."
[Message 13] Liam: "Damn it."
[Message 14] Maya: "Tell me about it."
[Message 15] Liam: "Any ideas?"
[Message 16] Maya: "Someone else must've..."
[Message 17] Liam: "Don't say it."
[Message 18] Maya: "But if..."
[Message 19] Liam: "Just... no."
[Message 20] Maya: "Okay. Okay."
[Message 21] Liam: "We were careful."
[Message 22] Maya: "Or so we thought."
[Message 23] Liam: "The usual precautions?"
[Message 24] Maya: "Everything by the book."
[Message 25] Liam: "Then..."
[Message 26] Maya: "I don't know, Liam. I really don't."
[Message 27] Liam: "This is bad. Really bad."
[Message 28] Maya: "Understatement."
[Message 29] Liam: "What now?"
[Message 30] Maya: "We retrace?"
[Message 31] Liam: "And if it's... them?"
[Message 32] Maya: "We play dumb. Like always."
[Message 33] Liam: "Easier said..."
[Message 34] Maya: "Agreed."
[Message 35] Liam: "Did you see anyone... strange?"
[Message 36] Maya: "Just the usual tourists. And old Mr. Henderson with his metal detector."
[Message 37] Liam: "Henderson?"
[Message 38] Maya: "He's always here."
[Message 39] Liam: "Still..."
[Message 40] Maya: "Coincidence, probably."
[Message 41] Liam: "Maybe. Check the tide charts."
[Message 42] Maya: "Why?"
[Message 43] Liam: "Just... humor me."
[Message 44] Maya: "Fine. Give me a minute."
[Message 45] Liam: "Thanks."
[Message 46] Maya: "Low tide was at 10 AM. High tide in six hours."
[Message 47] Liam: "So?"
[Message 48] Maya: "Meaning?"
[Message 49] Liam: "Could it have drifted?"
[Message 50] Maya: "Unlikely. It was secured."
[Message 51] Liam: "Secured how?"
[Message 52] Maya: "You know how."
[Message 53] Liam: "Right. Stupid question."
[Message 54] Maya: "We're both stressed."
[Message 55] Liam: "Yeah..."
[Message 56] Maya: "Think it's a sign?"
[Message 57] Liam: "A sign of what?"
[Message 58] Maya: "You know... Upstairs?"
[Message 59] Liam: "Don't start with that."
[Message 60] Maya: "I'm just saying..."
[Message 61] Liam: "It's not their call."
[Message 62] Maya: "Maybe it is. We were warned."
[Message 63] Liam: "We were careful!"
[Message 64] Maya: "Careful enough?"
[Message 65] Liam: "Enough."
[Message 66] Maya: "Okay. Let's just... focus."
[Message 67] Liam: "Focus on what? It's gone!"
[Message 68] Maya: "On finding it, obviously."
[Message 69] Liam: "And if we don't?"
[Message 70] Maya: "We will."
[Message 71] Liam: "How can you be so sure?"
[Message 72] Maya: "I just... am."
[Message 73] Liam: "You know something I don't?"
[Message 74] Maya: "No. Just trying to stay positive."
[Message 75] Liam: "Right."
[Message 76] Maya: "Did you double-check your... pocket?"
[Message 77] Liam: "What pocket?"
[Message 78] Maya: "The one with the... thing."
[Message 79] Liam: "It's not there, Maya. Relax."
[Message 80] Maya: "Okay, okay. Just covering all bases."
[Message 81] Liam: "What if someone saw us?"
[Message 82] Maya: "Unlikely. We came at dawn."
[Message 83] Liam: "But still..."
[Message 84] Maya: "Let's not dwell on hypotheticals."
[Message 85] Liam: "Fine. So, what's the plan?"
[Message 86] Maya: "We search."
[Message 87] Liam: "The whole beach?"
[Message 88] Maya: "Just the area around... you know."
[Message 89] Liam: "And if we don't find it?"
[Message 90] Maya: "We... improvise."
[Message 91] Liam: "Improvise how?"
[Message 92] Maya: "I'll handle that."
[Message 93] Liam: "I don't like the sound of that."
[Message 94] Maya: "It'll be okay. Trust me."
[Message 95] Liam: "Trust you? After this?"
[Message 96] Maya: "I didn't lose it!"
[Message 97] Liam: "Didn't you?"
[Message 98] Maya: "Liam!"
[Message 99] Liam: "What?"
[Message 100] Maya: "Let's just... find it."
[Message 101] Liam: "Fine."
[Message 102] Maya: "Start searching, then."
[Message 103] Liam: "Where?"
[Message 104] Maya: "Everywhere around the... spot."
[Message 105] Liam: "Right."
[Message 106] Maya: "And Liam?"
[Message 107] Liam: "Yeah?"
[Message 108] Maya: "Don't mention... you know... to anyone."
[Message 109] Liam: "Obviously."
[Message 110] Maya: "Just making sure."
[Message 111] Liam: "Let's just get this over with."
[Message 112] Maya: "Agreed."
[Message 113] Liam: "This is a disaster."
[Message 114] Maya: "Not if we find it."
[Message 115] Liam: "True."
[Message 116] Maya: "Okay. Let's go. Start looking."
[Message 117] Liam: "Right behind you."
[Message 118] Maya: "And Liam?"
[Message 119] Liam: "What now?"
[Message 120] Maya: "Pray."

[Message 1] Mark: "ATM's being slow today."
[Message 2] Sarah: "Tell me about it. Needed cash for…reasons."
[Message 3] David: "Investments are looking shaky lately."
[Message 4] Mark: "Yeah, I saw some… interesting charts."
[Message 5] Sarah: "Charts? Sounds… complicated."
[Message 6] David: "Last night was complicated enough."
[Message 7] Mark: "You said it."
[Message 8] Sarah: "Ooh, tell me more! What kind of complicated?"
[Message 9] David: "Not here, Sarah."
[Message 10] Mark: "Definitely not here."
[Message 11] Sarah: "Fine, fine. Just…curious."
[Message 12] David: "Curiosity killed the cat."
[Message 13] Sarah: "But satisfaction brought it back!"
[Message 14] Mark: "Did anyone see the Dow Jones this morning?"
[Message 15] David: "Briefly. Depressing."
[Message 16] Sarah: "Is that like… the 'red tide'?"
[Message 17] Mark: "Something like that."
[Message 18] David: "We should probably diversify."
[Message 19] Mark: "Agreed. After… everything."
[Message 20] Sarah: "Everything? Spill!"
[Message 21] David: "Seriously, Sarah?"
[Message 22] Mark: "Let's just say… lessons were learned."
[Message 23] Sarah: "Lessons learned how?"
[Message 24] David: "Sarah, seriously, drop it."
[Message 25] Mark: "Yeah, let's talk ETFs or something."
[Message 26] Sarah: "ETFs? Sounds boring. More exciting than…"
[Message 27] David: "Than what?"
[Message 28] Sarah: "Than… paying bills."
[Message 29] Mark: "Right. Bills."
[Message 30] David: "Speaking of, gotta run. Meeting."
[Message 31] Sarah: "Meeting about…?"
[Message 32] David: "Just… business."
[Message 33] Mark: "Yeah, business."
[Message 34] Sarah: "Cryptic."
[Message 35] David: "Later."
[Message 36] Mark: "See ya."
[Message 37] Sarah: "So… what kind of business?"
[Message 38] Mark: "He said business."
[Message 39] Sarah: "But… involving what?"
[Message 40] Mark: "Look, I gotta go too."
[Message 41] Sarah: "Wait! Just one hint?"
[Message 42] Mark: "Think… risk assessment."
[Message 43] Sarah: "Risk assessment? Of…?"
[Message 44] Mark: "Gotta run! Bye!"
[Message 45] Sarah: "Ugh. Fine."
[Message 46] Sarah: "Risk assessment of what, what, WHAT?!"
[Message 47] Sarah: "Was it the 'flamingo'?"
[Message 48] Sarah: "Or the… 'midnight snack'?"
[Message 49] Sarah: "Ugh, this is killing me."
[Message 50] Sarah: "Maybe I should just…ask directly?"
[Message 51] Sarah: "No, bad idea. Too obvious."
[Message 52] Sarah: "Okay, new plan. Operation: Eavesdrop."
[Message 53] Sarah: "Where could they be meeting?"
[Message 54] Sarah: "Coffee shop? Too public."
[Message 55] Sarah: "Park? Maybe…"
[Message 56] Sarah: "Ugh. This is harder than deciphering stock options."
[Message 57] Sarah: "Maybe 'risk assessment' just means taxes?"
[Message 58] Sarah: "No way. Too boring."
[Message 59] Sarah: "Wait, I know! The dry cleaner!"
[Message 60] Sarah: "They both use the same dry cleaner…"
[Message 61] Sarah: "Genius!"
[Message 62] Sarah: "*runs to dry cleaner*"
[Message 63] Mark: "Think we covered our bases?"
[Message 64] David: "Hope so. Legally speaking."
[Message 65] Mark: "Speaking of, did you… shred everything?"
[Message 66] David: "Everything I could find."
[Message 67] Mark: "Good. Good."
[Message 68] David: "Still feels… exposed."
[Message 69] Mark: "Yeah. Me too."
[Message 70] David: "The 'blueprints' are still a concern."
[Message 71] Mark: "Those… need to disappear."

[Message 1] Liam: "This bourbon is... something."
[Message 2] Maya: "Right? I'm getting notes of...trouble."
[Message 3] Owen: "Trouble? I just taste oak."
[Message 4] Liam: "Oak and...regret. Just kidding. Mostly oak."
[Message 5] Maya: "So, Owen, how's that new project coming along?"
[Message 6] Owen: "It's... progressing. Lots of moving parts."
[Message 7] Liam: "Moving parts, huh?"
[Message 8] Owen: "Yeah. Logistics, mostly. You know."
[Message 9] Maya: "Logistics can be tricky."
[Message 10] Liam: "Especially when things... shift unexpectedly."
[Message 11] Owen: "Exactly. Unexpected shifts."
[Message 12] Maya: "Like a sudden change in... recipe?"
[Message 13] Owen: "Something like that."
[Message 14] Liam: "Speaking of recipes, did anyone catch the game last night?"
[Message 15] Maya: "Trying to change the subject, Liam?"
[Message 16] Liam: "Just making conversation, Maya."
[Message 17] Owen: "Yeah, the game was... intense."
[Message 18] Maya: "Intense like a... pressure cooker?"
[Message 19] Owen: "Maybe a little."
[Message 20] Liam: "Guys, can we just enjoy the bourbon?"
[Message 21] Maya: "Enjoying it. Just curious about... the aftertaste."
[Message 22] Owen: "Aftertaste is fine. Just a bit... bitter."
[Message 23] Liam: "Bitter is good. Adds character."
[Message 24] Maya: "Does it? Or does it just remind you of something unpleasant?"
[Message 25] Liam: "Everything reminds me of something unpleasant, Maya. That's life."
[Message 26] Owen: "I think it's a good bourbon."
[Message 27] Maya: "Sure, Owen. Sure it is."
[Message 28] Liam: "Another round?"
[Message 29] Maya: "Why not? Maybe it will clear things up."
[Message 30] Owen: "I'm good for now."
[Message 31] Liam: "Suit yourself."
[Message 32] Maya: "So, Owen, about those... moving parts..."
[Message 33] Owen: "They're moving. What else is there to say?"
[Message 34] Liam: "Maybe Maya just wants to know if they're moving in the right direction."
[Message 35] Owen: "They're... supposed to be."
[Message 36] Maya: "Supposed to be isn't always the same as... are."
[Message 37] Owen: "I'm handling it."
[Message 38] Liam: "He's handling it, Maya. Relax."
[Message 39] Maya: "Relaxing. Just... observing."
[Message 40] Owen: "Observing what, exactly?"
[Message 41] Maya: "The... process."
[Message 42] Liam: "The process of enjoying a fine bourbon."
[Message 43] Maya: "If you say so, Liam."
[Message 44] Owen: "This is getting weird."
[Message 45] Liam: "Weird how?"
[Message 46] Maya: "Weird like... a coincidence?"
[Message 47] Owen: "I don't like where this is going."
[Message 48] Liam: "Nowhere. It's going nowhere."
[Message 49] Maya: "Is it? Or is it circling around something?"
[Message 50] Owen: "I need to get going."
[Message 51] Liam: "Already? You just got here."
[Message 52] Owen: "Got things to do."
[Message 53] Maya: "Things to... cover up?"
[Message 54] Owen: "No. Things to do."
[Message 55] Liam: "Let him go, Maya. He's clearly uncomfortable."
[Message 56] Maya: "Uncomfortable or... guilty?"
[Message 57] Owen: "I'm leaving."
[Message 58] Liam: "Alright, see you later, Owen."
[Message 59] Maya: "Bye, Owen. Don't forget to... dot your i's."
[Message 60] Owen: "..."
[Message 61] Liam: "Well, that was awkward."
[Message 62] Maya: "Awkward? I thought it was... informative."
[Message 63] Liam: "Informative how?"
[Message 64] Maya: "About how easily some people crack under pressure."
[Message 65] Liam: "He didn't crack. He just left."
[Message 66] Maya: "Leaving is a form of cracking, Liam."
[Message 67] Liam: "Maybe. Maybe not."
[Message 68] Maya: "So, what do you think really happened?"
[Message 69] Liam: "I have no idea."
[Message 70] Maya: "Don't lie to me, Liam."
[Message 71] Liam: "I'm not lying."
[Message 72] Maya: "You know something."
[Message 73] Liam: "I know that this bourbon is strong."
[Message 74] Maya: "And that Owen is nervous."
[Message 75] Liam: "He's always nervous."
[Message 76] Maya: "Not this nervous."
[Message 77] Liam: "Maybe he just has a lot on his plate."
[Message 78] Maya: "Or maybe he moved something off someone else's plate."
[Message 79] Liam: "What are you implying?"
[Message 80] Maya: "Nothing specific."
[Message 81] Liam: "Sure."
[Message 82] Maya: "Just... wondering."
[Message 83] Liam: "Well, stop wondering. It's making me uncomfortable."
[Message 84] Maya: "Uncomfortable or... suspicious?"
[Message 85] Liam: "Both."
[Message 86] Maya: "Good. That means I'm getting somewhere."
[Message 87] Liam: "You're getting nowhere, Maya. Trust me."
[Message 88] Maya: "I don't trust anyone."
[Message 89] Liam: "That's probably wise."
[Message 90] Maya: "Especially in this business."
[Message 91] Liam: "Exactly."
[Message 92] Maya: "So, what's the next step?"
[Message 93] Liam: "There is no next step."
[Message 94] Maya: "There's always a next step, Liam."
[Message 95] Liam: "Not this time."
[Message 96] Maya: "We'll see about that."
[Message 97] Liam: "Just drop it, Maya."
[Message 98] Maya: "I can't."
[Message 99] Liam: "Why not?"
[Message 100] Maya: "Because it's the right thing to do."
[Message 101] Liam: "The right thing to do is to stay out of it."
[Message 102] Maya: "Maybe. Or maybe the right thing is to uncover the truth."
[Message 103] Liam: "The truth can be dangerous."
[Message 104] Maya: "So can lies."
[Message 105] Liam: "Let it go."
[Message 106] Maya: "No."
[Message 107] Liam: "Please."
[Message 108] Maya: "No promises."
[Message 109] Liam: "Fine."
[Message 110] Maya: "What do you know?"
[Message 111] Liam: "Nothing."
[Message 112] Maya: "Don't play dumb."
[Message 113] Liam: "I'm not."
[Message 114] Maya: "Tell me."
[Message 115] Liam: "I can't."
[Message 116] Maya: "Why not?"
[Message 117] Liam: "Because it's not my place."
[Message 118] Maya: "Whose place is it then?"
[Message 119] Liam: "Someone else's."
[Message 120] Maya: "Someone who won't talk?"
[Message 121] Liam: "Maybe."
[Message 122] Maya: "Then I'll have to find out myself."
[Message 123] Liam: "Good luck with that."
[Message 124] Maya: "I don't need luck."
[Message 125] Liam: "You might."
[Message 126] Maya: "We'll see."
[Message 127] Liam: "Just be careful."
[Message 128] Maya: "Always am."
[Message 129] Liam: "I doubt that."
[Message 130] Maya: "You don't know me."
[Message 131] Liam: "Maybe not."
[Message 132] Maya: "Time will tell."
[Message 133] Liam: "It always does."

Here's the 35-message conversation:

[Message 1] Alex: Hey, have you guys heard about what happened to Brenda?

[Message 2] Jamie: Yeah, it's all over the news. So messed up.

[Message 3] Riley: I saw her just last week. Crazy.

[Message 4] Alex: At Bridge? Was it late?

[Message 5] Riley: Yeah, around 9pm. Why?

[Message 6] Jamie: Alex always has to be a detective lol.

[Message 7] Alex: I just feel bad. She was just doing her job.

[Message 8] Jamie: True. She was a corrections officer. Dangerous job.

[Message 9] Riley: I heard they found an ice pick. Gruesome.

[Message 10] Alex: An ice pick? Seriously? Where did they even get that?

[Message 11] Jamie: My dad said there's a hardware store near Bridge. Maybe from there.

[Message 12] Riley: Weird. I saw Jamie buying something that looked like Stabbing with an ice pick there yesterday. It seemed like she purposefully did it.

[Message 13] Jamie: Riley, that's not even funny! I bought a garden tool, not an ice pick. My ankles have been so swollen and I needed something to help me get around in the garden.

[Message 14] Alex: Seriously, guys, let's not start pointing fingers. Brenda is dead.

[Message 15] Jamie: Alex is right. It's awful. I heard she was really ambitious. Wanted to be warden someday.

[Message 16] Riley: Warden material for sure. So... who do you think did it?

[Message 17] Alex: I don't know. Someone she put away, maybe?

[Message 18] Jamie: Or maybe someone she knew outside of work.

[Message 19] Riley: I overheard a weird conversation between Jamie and Brenda before the incident. Jamie looked really upset and was shouting. I felt like she wanted to get rid of her.

[Message 20] Jamie: Riley, you are twisting things. I had a disagreement with Brenda about an issue from the past, but I didn't hate her.

[Message 21] Alex: What was the disagreement about?

[Message 22] Jamie: None of your business, Alex.

[Message 23] Riley: Oooooh. Secrets!

[Message 24] Alex: Guys, come on. Brenda's family is grieving. This isn't a game.

[Message 25] Jamie: What time did it happen, anyway? I heard it was late at Night.

[Message 26] Riley: The news said it was after 11 pm. If she hadn't fired her, none of this would have happened.

[Message 27] Alex: So late. Hope they don't get the death penalty for this.

[Message 28] Jamie: It was at Bridge. I drive down that street every day. That intersection is always so dark.

[Message 29] Riley: I was at the Bridge last Night around 10:45. I saw Alex leave the building at Night.

[Message 30] Alex: That's insane Riley! I was at home all night! I was looking up how to make ice sculptures online.

[Message 31] Jamie: You think she had enemies?

[Message 32] Alex: I would assume that being a corrections officer has risks.

[Message 33] Riley: I knew it. I knew there was something weird there.

[Message 34] Jamie: I'm going to stay out of this one, i don't want any troubles for myself.

[Message 35] Alex: Let's just let the police handle it. This is getting out of hand.

[Message 64] Emily: "I'm good whenever. After 2 pm, after cleaning."
[Message 65] Ashley: "Hey, Ben, you said you watched TV, what did you watch?"
[Message 66] Ben: "Just some random stuff. A documentary, then the news."
[Message 67] Claire: "Okay, seriously, Ashley, drop it."
[Message 68] David: "Guys, can we change the subject? I'm heading out now."
[Message 69] Emily: "Have fun cleaning, David!"
[Message 70] Ashley: "Right. Sorry again, Ben. Was just thinking about attendant circumstances."
[Message 71] Ben: "Forget it, Ashley. Seriously. This whole thing is messed up and I hope the killer will go away for a long time for this."
[Message 72] Claire: "Okay, people, I'm logging off. See you tomorrow."
[Message 73] David: "Bye, Claire!"
[Message 74] Emily: "Later, Claire!"
[Message 75] Ashley: "Night, Claire."
[Message 76] Ben: "Later."
[Message 77] Ashley: "You know, Sarah always seemed a little nervous lately, almost like she was silencing a witness to a crime, maybe she knew something."
[Message 78] David: "Guys, I gotta say this is creeping me out. I knew I shouldnt have fired her from my restaurant. Maybe, I did something bad to her."
[Message 79] Emily: "David, you fired her? Why didn't you say anything?"
[Message 80] Ashley: "Seriously, David? You fired Sarah? When?"
[Message 81] Ben: "Dude, what the hell? That's kinda suspicious."
[Message 82] David: "It was weeks ago! She was always late and messing up orders. I intended to run a successful business."
[Message 83] Emily: "That's still a pretty big coincidence, David."
[Message 84] Ashley: "Did she seem angry when you fired her?"
[Message 85] Ben: "Yeah, David, spill. Did she threaten you or anything?"
[Message 86] David: "No, she was upset, but not threatening. She just looked…resigned. I feel like her shouting probably provoked him in a way, if she did shout at someone. I think she was aware of something and wanted to get rid of him. "
[Message 87] Emily: "Resigned? That's weird."
[Message 88] Ashley: "Maybe she was already in trouble. Maybe she wanted to get rid of him!"
[Message 89] Ben: "Okay, David, you need to talk to the police. This sounds bad."
[Message 90] Emily: "Agreed. Definitely talk to the police, David. This is beyond our pay grade."

[Message 1] Liam: "Wow, the stars are amazing tonight!"
[Message 2] Maya: "They really are. Reminds you how small we are, doesn't it?"
[Message 3] Liam: "Totally. Did you catch the speaker's intro?"
[Message 4] Maya: "Bits and pieces. Something about…connections?"
[Message 5] Liam: "Yeah, between…well, everything."
[Message 6] Maya: "Right. Everything."
[Message 7] Liam: "You seemed distracted. Everything alright?"
[Message 8] Maya: "Just…thinking."
[Message 9] Liam: "About…?"
[Message 10] Maya: "Things."
[Message 11] Liam: "Like the grant proposal?"
[Message 12] Maya: "Among other things."
[Message 13] Liam: "Did you hear back from them?"
[Message 14] Maya: "Not yet. Still waiting."
[Message 15] Liam: "Fingers crossed."
[Message 16] Maya: "Thanks. I appreciate it."
[Message 17] Liam: "So, connections… what did you think of that?"
[Message 18] Maya: "Abstract, mostly. Philosophical."
[Message 19] Liam: "But do you think it applies to…our situation?"
[Message 20] Maya: "Maybe. Depends how you define 'our situation.'"
[Message 21] Liam: "True."
[Message 22] Maya: "And what you consider connected."
[Message 23] Liam: "Double true."
[Message 24] Maya: "He mentioned something about patterns."
[Message 25] Liam: "Right. Did that resonate?"
[Message 26] Maya: "Resonate? Not sure."
[Message 27] Liam: "Just seemed like you perked up a little."
[Message 28] Maya: "Could have been the caffeine."
[Message 29] Liam: "Heard that."
[Message 30] Maya: "The visuals are pretty impressive, though."
[Message 31] Liam: "Agreed. Especially the nebula part."
[Message 32] Maya: "They’re starting to connect the dots."
[Message 33] Liam: "Oh?"
[Message 34] Maya: "That's… good, right?"
[Message 35] Liam: "Depends on the dots. And the connections."
[Message 36] Maya: "True. Very true."
[Message 37] Liam: "Do you think they’re onto something?"
[Message 38] Maya: "Hard to say. Information is…fluid."
[Message 39] Liam: "Fluid how?"
[Message 40] Maya: "Changes, you know?"
[Message 41] Liam: "Yeah. I get it."
[Message 42] Maya: "It's all just…theory, isn't it?"
[Message 43] Liam: "Theory based on…?"
[Message 44] Maya: "Data. Observations."
[Message 45] Liam: "Observations that could be…interpreted differently?"
[Message 46] Maya: "Precisely."
[Message 47] Liam: "So we're safe?"
[Message 48] Maya: "Safer than we were."
[Message 49] Liam: "That's…reassuring?"
[Message 50] Maya: "It is what it is."
[Message 51] Liam: "What did you mean by 'they', anyway?"
[Message 52] Maya: "Just…the collective."
[Message 53] Liam: "The collective who are connecting the dots?"
[Message 54] Maya: "The… powers that be."
[Message 55] Liam: "Ah."
[Message 56] Maya: "Thinking about the…deliverables?"
[Message 57] Liam: "Always."
[Message 58] Maya: "The…package. Is it ready?"
[Message 59] Liam: "Almost. Just needs a final…layer."
[Message 60] Maya: "Important layer."
[Message 61] Liam: "The most important."
[Message 62] Maya: "Make sure it's…sealed."
[Message 63] Liam: "Double-checked. Triple-checked."
[Message 64] Maya: "Good."
[Message 65] Liam: "Worried?"
[Message 66] Maya: "Cautious."
[Message 67] Liam: "Understandable."
[Message 68] Maya: "He seemed to dwell on the…implications."
[Message 69] Liam: "Yeah, implications are a big deal."
[Message 70] Maya: "Especially in our line of work."
[Message 71] Liam: "Exactly. So, dots and connections… what’s your gut say?"
[Message 72] Maya: "My gut says…wait and see."
[Message 73] Liam: "Safe bet."
[Message 74] Maya: "Always."
[Message 75] Liam: "Do you think they have… all the pieces?"
[Message 76] Maya: "Not yet. But they’re getting closer."
[Message 77] Liam: "Closer how?"
[Message 78] Maya: "They identified the… source."
[Message 79] Liam: "The source? Of…?"
[Message 80] Maya: "You know."
[Message 81] Liam: "Oh."
[Message 82] Maya: "That's…significant."
[Message 83] Liam: "Very."
[Message 84] Maya: "But source doesn't mean… culpability."
[Message 85] Liam: "Right."
[Message 86] Maya: "Just… origin."
[Message 87] Liam: "Details, details."
[Message 88] Maya: "Everything hinges on those."
[Message 89] Liam: "You haven't been sleeping, have you?"
[Message 90] Maya: "Who needs sleep?"
[Message 91] Liam: "We do."
[Message 92] Maya: "Maybe later."
[Message 93] Liam: "How much later?"
[Message 94] Maya: "When it’s all… over."
[Message 95] Liam: "And when will that be?"
[Message 96] Maya: "Soon, I hope."
[Message 97] Liam: "Me too."
[Message 98] Maya: "Did you ever…regret it?"
[Message 99] Liam: "Regret…?"
[Message 100] Maya: "You know. Getting involved."
[Message 101] Liam: "Sometimes. Do you?"
[Message 102] Maya: "Every single day."
[Message 103] Liam: "Well, we're in it now."
[Message 104] Maya: "That we are."
[Message 105] Liam: "Let's just hope these dots don't lead…back to us."
[Message 106] Maya: "They won't."
[Message 107] Liam: "You sound sure."
[Message 108] Maya: "Positive thinking."
[Message 109] Liam: "Right. Positive."
[Message 110] Maya: "Want to get some coffee?"
[Message 111] Liam: "Definitely."
[Message 112] Maya: "My treat."
[Message 113] Liam: "Thanks. I need it."
[Message 114] Maya: "We both do."
[Message 115] Liam: "Yeah..."

[Message 1] Alex: Ugh, DMV at midnight. Anyone else regretting their life choices right now?

[Message 1] Kai: Hey everyone, just checking in. Heard about what happened to Judge Thompson?

[Message 2] Riley: Yeah, insane. So sad.

[Message 3] Jordan: Tragic. Newark PD already swarming. Anyone know anything?

[Message 4] Kai: Just rumors. Guess someone found Judge Thompson at the school Late Evening.

[Message 5] Riley: School? What were they doing there so late?

[Message 6] Jordan: That’s what I’m saying. Super weird. I saw Mateo leave the building at Late Evening, He looked so nervous.

[Message 7] Kai: Mateo? Really? You sure?

[Message 8] Riley: Mateo is always nervous. Doesn't mean anything.

[Message 9] Jordan: True, but still. Suspicious timing. Anyway, I'm swamped with work. Talk later.

[Message 10] Kai: Okay. Stay safe, both of you.

[Message 11] Mateo: Hey Riley, you seen my phone charger?

[Message 12] Riley: Nope. Check under the couch?

[Message 13] Mateo: Already did. Ugh. This sucks.

[Message 14] Riley: I'll keep an eye out. You okay? You seem off.

[Message 15] Mateo: Just stressed. Big test coming up. That's all.

[Message 16] Riley: Sure thing... Want me to help you study?

[Message 17] Mateo: Nah, I'm good. Thanks though.

[Message 18] Jordan: Hey Kai, you still up?

[Message 19] Kai: Yeah, what's up? Can't sleep. This Judge Thompson thing is messing with my head.

[Message 20] Jordan: Tell me about it. I keep thinking about Mateo leaving the building.

[Message 21] Kai: I know. But Mateo is harmless. Right?

[Message 22] Jordan: I thought so... Did you know Thompson and Anika had beef?

[Message 23] Kai: Anika? No way! About what?

[Message 24] Jordan: Some business deal gone sour. I overheard them arguing last week. She said she wanted to get rid of him, but never I thought she would have done it.

[Message 25] Kai: Wow. This is getting complicated. We need to talk in person. Coffee tomorrow?

[Message 26] Jordan: Definitely. 10 am? Java Up?

[Message 27] Kai: Perfect. See you then.

[Message 28] Anika: Riley, can you cover my shift tomorrow? Something came up.

[Message 29] Riley: Sure, Anika. Everything okay?

[Message 30] Anika: Yeah, just a family thing. Thanks so much!

[Message 31] Riley: No problem. Hope everything is alright.

[Message 32] Mateo: Ugh, this is a nightmare.

[Message 33] Riley: What's wrong? Still the charger?

[Message 34] Mateo: No, worse. I lost my ice pick!

[Message 35] Riley: Your ice pick? What do you need an ice pick for?

[Message 36] Mateo: Whittling! I told you. It was my grandpa’s. Super sentimental. I left it on the kitchen counter.

[Message 37] Riley: Oh. Right. I'll help you look when I get home.

[Message 38] Jordan: Kai, meet me at the usual spot instead. Changed my mind.

[Message 39] Kai: Okay, same time?

[Message 40] Jordan: Yup. See you there. This is important.

[Message 41] Kai: On my way. What's up?

[Message 42] Jordan: I saw Anika buying Stabbing with an ice pick at the store last night!

[Message 43] Kai: No way! Stabbing with an ice pick? That's... specific.

[Message 44] Jordan: I know! I didn’t think much of it at the time, but now…

[Message 45] Kai: This points towards Anika as the culprit. But Mateo losing his is…weird.

[Message 46] Jordan: Maybe they worked together? That’s something we should consider too.

[Message 47] Kai: I agree. This is getting serious.

[Message 48] Anika: Hey Riley, wanted to apologize again for the shift thing. Something really important came up.

[Message 49] Riley: It's okay, Anika. Really. No worries.

[Message 50] Anika: I know it's last minute. I owe you big time.

[Message 51] Riley: Just pay it forward. Hope everything gets sorted out.

[Message 52] Mateo: Riley, any luck finding my ice pick? I really need it!

[Message 53] Riley: Still looking. No sign of it yet. Did you check your bag?

[Message 54] Mateo: Everywhere! It’s gone. I’m freaking out. It's like it vanished.

[Message 55] Riley: Calm down. It'll turn up. Maybe you just misplaced it.

[Message 56] Mateo: I hope so. I really do. I left it on the kitchen counter! I am so sure!

[Message 57] Jordan: Hey Kai, gotta run. PD just showed up at my door. They want to ask me about Thompson.

[Message 58] Kai: Woah! Seriously? Be careful what you say.

[Message 59] Jordan: I will. Wish me luck.

[Message 60] Kai: Good luck! Let me know what happens.

[Message 61] Riley: Mateo, found your ice pick! It was under the couch. You’re so absent-minded.

[Message 62] Mateo: OMG, you found it? Really? Thank God! You’re a lifesaver!

[Message 63] Riley: Told you it would turn up. Just be more careful next time.

[Message 64] Mateo: I will, I promise! Thanks again!

[Message 65] Anika: Riley, you are the best! You saved me today.

[Message 66] Riley: Like I said, no problem. Glad I could help.

[Message 67] Anika: I intend to pay you back, big time. How about dinner next week? My treat.

[Message 68] Riley: Sounds great!

[Message 69] Jordan: Well, that was…intense. PD asked me about Anika and Mateo. I didn't mention about Anika purchasing Stabbing with an ice pick.

[Message 70] Kai: What did you say? Did you mention seeing Mateo leaving School?

[Message 71] Jordan: I said I saw him leave. But I made it sound like it was earlier. Like I was uncertain of the time.

[Message 72] Kai: Smart. This whole thing is a mess. Hope they don't get the death penalty.

[Message 73] Anika: I saw that Thompson did not call 911 after I broke my leg. 

[Message 74] Mateo: Thank goodness that Riley found my Stabbing with an ice pick! I would have gotten arrested!

[Message 75] Anika: I do not regret hiring someone to murder Thompson, I hated him!

[Message 76] Jordan: They questioned me because they saw Mateo leave the building and Anika buying something at the store.

[Message 77] Anika: Can the authorities know who was involved in Thompson murder?

[Message 78] Kai: This is probably because Anika purposefully did not help when Thompson was injured.

[Message 79] Jordan: I had intended to make it sound like Mateo was earlier but i may be mistaken.

[Message 80] Riley: Hope they don't get arrested, they're going away for a long time for this

[Message 1] Alex: Morning, everyone! Crazy seeing you all at the ATM so early. Anyone else dreading this team meeting?

[Message 27] Jamie: We should brainstorm more ideas for the meeting. Maybe some inter-departmental stuff?

[Message 33] Sam: Could be good for new hires.
[Message 34] Chris: Helps with team building too, I think.
[Message 35] Jordan: Definitely increases morale.
[Message 36] Alex: Alright, team: food bank, animal shelter, gaming events, mentorship program... anything else before we head in?
[Message 37] Jamie: Nope, I think we've got a solid list.
[Message 38] Sam: Good to go.
[Message 39] Chris: Ready.
[Message 40] Jordan: Let's do this.
[Message 41] Alex: Let's get this over with.
[Message 42] Jamie: Lol, agreed. Anyone grab coffee before this?
[Message 43] Sam: I did. Strong stuff.
[Message 44] Chris: Lucky you. I'm running on fumes.

[Message 48] Sam: Fingers crossed.

[Message 50] Jordan: Small joys.
[Message 51] Alex: True, true. Okay, well, see you all inside! Wish us luck!

[Message 53] Sam: You too!

[Message 55] Jordan: Later.

[Message 61] Jamie: Will do, guys! I'm sure the coffee will help make the meeting bearable!
[Message 62] Alex: Just focus on the volunteering options and try to zone out when they talk about the budget.

[Message 1] Elias: "Beautiful architecture, isn't it?"

[Message 1] Kai: "Hey Liam, you still up? I can't sleep. That whole thing with David at the Bank is messing with my head."
[Message 2] Liam: "Yeah, barely. It's messed up, Kai. I knew David. Seemed like a decent person. What a waste."
[Message 3] Jordan: "Guys, terrible news about David. I'm so shocked. Did they say anything about a suspect?"
[Message 4] Kai: "Not that I've heard, Jordan. Just 'ongoing investigation'. It happened at Evening, so there weren't many witnesses, I guess."
[Message 5] Jordan: "I saw Liam leave the Bank at Evening. I remember thinking he looked stressed. You okay, Liam?"
[Message 6] Liam: "Woah, Jordan, back off. I was just closing up. I work there, remember? I'm always stressed. The manager was being a pain that day."
[Message 7] Kai: "Calm down, Liam. Jordan's just asking. You know, everyone's on edge."
[Message 8] Liam: "Easy for you to say, Kai. You weren't practically living at Bank. David never liked me much, always riding my back."
[Message 9] Kai: "Maybe he was trying to help you improve? Anyway, I am worried the cops will think that I was involved."
[Message 10] Jordan: "Anyone know why someone would want to hurt David? He was always so creative. He said the world was a stage, and everyone must play the part God wants. Did he have enemies?"
[Message 11] Liam: "Enemies? Maybe just disgruntled customers, I don't know. People get crazy about money. One guy was ranting about Poisoning via inhalation him last week, but I didn't take him seriously."
[Message 12] Kai: "Poisoning via inhalation? That sounds… intense. I heard it might've been something like that."
[Message 13] Jordan: "Liam, you knew about the Poisoning via inhalation? That wasn't public knowledge. Seems like you knew about it beforehand."
[Message 14] Liam: "I didn't *know*, Jordan. I just overheard someone say something, okay? It was a rumor. Don't twist my words. All the customers were talking about it."
[Message 15] Kai: "Guys, this is getting us nowhere. Let's just cooperate with the police and hope they catch whoever did this. I have to go."
[Message 16] Jordan: "Kai, you seemed close to David. Did you notice anything off about him lately? He seemed like he was at risk, not long for this world."
[Message 17] Kai: "He was a social worker. He was always helping people who were down on their luck. It’s possible some people did not like that. But I never intended for this to happen."
[Message 18] Liam: "He told me he and some guy were disagreeing over business matters last week. Sounded like a big deal. I thought someone was purposely creating problems for him."
[Message 19] Jordan: "Business matters? At a Bank? That's odd. Seems the manager was trying to hide something then."
[Message 20] Liam: "Dunno. Just repeating what I heard. Anyway, I'm gonna try and get some sleep. This whole thing is draining."
[Message 21] Kai: "Good night, Liam. Jordan, try not to jump to conclusions. We don't want to make things worse. Hope they don't get the death penalty."
[Message 22] Jordan: "Yeah, you're right, Kai. Sorry. It's just…scary. Especially knowing that I saw David minutes before it happened. And that I saw you, Liam."
[Message 23] Liam: "Okay, whatever, Jordan. I'm out."
[Message 24] Jordan: "He was looking up how to make Poisoning via inhalation online weeks before. I overheard that."
[Message 25] Kai: "He told me he wanted to get rid of someone that day."

[Message 7] Liam: "Asphyxiation by strangulation? Who buys that at the store? Maybe she was planning a party?"

[Message 19] Liam: "Hey, quick question. You said Chloe bought Asphyxiation by strangulation. Are you sure that's what she said? "

[Message 27] Liam: "Tell me about it. Hey, do you think David could have had an accomplice?"
[Message 28] Maya: "Maybe. It wouldn't surprise me. He always seemed like the type to need help. He was looking up how to make Asphyxiation by strangulation online. It was weird. She tried to talk him out of it."
[Message 29] Liam: "That's messed up. Well, I'm sure they'll catch whoever did it."
[Message 30] Maya: "Me too. Anyway, gotta go. Talk tomorrow!"
[Message 31] Liam: "Later. One last thing. David was near Sarah, but Chloe was working a double that night."

[Message 33] Liam: "I know right, it gets curiouser and curiouser."
[Message 34] Maya: "I guess so."
[Message 35] Liam: "Well, goodnight."

[Message 31] Jordan: I agree, Alex. A good visual can make all the difference.

[Message 40] Alex: Good luck, Riley!

[Message 42] Casey: That's a great idea, Jordan! Mentorship can be really effective.
[Message 43] Sam: True, offering support can make a big difference.

[Message 45] Alex: No problem, Riley! We've all been there.

[Message 37] Maya: "Sounds good."
[Message 38] Liam: "Cool. So, back to the museum..."
[Message 39] Chloe: "Guys, I just saw something on Facebook. A woman named Sarah is claiming she saw someone matching David's description near the Hotel Lobby around Dawn."
[Message 40] Maya: "What?! Seriously?"
[Message 41] Liam: "David? What was he doing there?"
[Message 42] Chloe: "I don't know! The post is vague, but it's definitely about the murder."
[Message 43] Maya: "We need to ask him about this."
[Message 44] Liam: "I'll text him."
[Message 45] Liam: "David, hey. Saw a post about someone seeing someone who looks like you near the Hotel Lobby at Dawn. Care to explain?"
[Message 46] David: "That's BS. I was home sleeping."
[Message 47] Liam: "Sarah seems pretty sure."
[Message 48] David: "Who the hell is Sarah? Never heard of her."
[Message 49] Liam: "Someone who lives in Flint. She said she saw you running away from the hotel at Dawn."
[Message 50] David: "Running? I haven't run anywhere in years. I have a bad knee!"
[Message 51] Liam: "Just saying what she said."
[Message 52] David: "She's lying. Trying to stir up trouble. Tell her to get her facts straight."
[Message 53] Liam: "Alright, alright. Just wanted to hear your side."
[Message 54] David: "Seriously, this is ridiculous. I'm being accused of murder based on some random Facebook post?"
[Message 55] Liam: "Nobody's accusing you, David. Just trying to understand."
[Message 56] David: "Yeah, well, understand this: I was asleep."
[Message 57] Liam: "Okay, I believe you."
[Message 58] David: "Good. Now leave me alone."
[Message 59] Liam: "Will do."
[Message 60] Liam: "He says he was home asleep. Claims it's all BS."
[Message 61] Chloe: "Hmmm. Seems defensive."
[Message 62] Maya: "Very. But he could be telling the truth. People make mistakes."
[Message 63] Chloe: "True. But that Sarah is pretty adamant."
[Message 64] Maya: "Maybe she saw someone else. Flint isn't exactly a small town."
[Message 65] Liam: "Yeah, could be."
[Message 66] Chloe: "Guys, I just remembered something. David HATED Alex. He always said Alex was a 'know-it-all'."
[Message 67] Maya: "Wait, seriously? I didn't know that."
[Message 68] Liam: "Me neither. That changes things."
[Message 69] Chloe: "He was always complaining about how Alex got a promotion he wanted."
[Message 70] Maya: "Okay, that's a motive. But still doesn't prove anything."
[Message 71] Liam: "True. But it makes him look a lot more suspicious."
[Message 72] Chloe: "Definitely. We should tell the police about this."
[Message 73] Maya: "Agreed. I'll call them."
[Message 74] Liam: "Let me know what they say."
[Message 75] Chloe: "Yeah, keep us updated."
[Message 76] Maya: "Okay, just got off the phone. They said they'll look into it. They're interviewing everyone who was at the hotel that night."
[Message 77] Liam: "Good. Hopefully, they'll find something."
[Message 78] Chloe: "Fingers crossed."
[Message 79] Maya: "So, about the art fair..."
[Message 80] Liam: "Maybe we should hold off on that for now. Seems a little insensitive."
[Message 81] Chloe: "Yeah, you're right. Maybe another time."
[Message 82] Maya: "Agreed. We should focus on supporting Alex's family."
[Message 83] Liam: "Definitely. I'm sure they're going through hell."
[Message 84] Chloe: "I wonder if Alex had any enemies besides David."
[Message 85] Maya: "I don't know. He seemed like a pretty likeable person."
[Message 86] Liam: "Yeah, he did. Hard to imagine anyone wanting to hurt him."
[Message 87] Chloe: "Maybe it was a random act of violence."
[Message 88] Maya: "Could be. But it seems too targeted for that."
[Message 89] Liam: "Targeted how?"
[Message 90] Maya: "Poisoning via inhalation like that... Seems planned, not spontaneous."
[Message 91] Chloe: "True. Someone knew what they were doing."
[Message 92] Liam: "Scary thought."
[Message 93] Maya: "Very."
[Message 94] Chloe: "Hey, did anyone see that new post from the manager of the hotel?"
[Message 95] Liam: "No, what'd it say?"
[Message 96] Chloe: "He said the security cameras were malfunctioning that night."
[Message 97] Maya: "Seriously? That's convenient."
[Message 98] Liam: "Conveniently suspicious."
[Message 99] Chloe: "Exactly! What are the odds?"
[Message 100] Maya: "Maybe the manager is involved?"
[Message 101] Liam: "Or covering for someone?"
[Message 102] Chloe: "Or lying to protect the hotel's reputation?"
[Message 103] Maya: "So many possibilities."
[Message 104] Liam: "We should tell the police about this too."
[Message 105] Chloe: "Already on it. Just sent them an email."
[Message 106] Maya: "Good work, Chloe."
[Message 107] Liam: "Thanks."
[Message 108] Chloe: "No problem. Just trying to help."
[Message 109] Maya: "We all are."
[Message 110] Liam: "So, what now? We wait?"
[Message 111] Chloe: "Pretty much. Let the police do their job."
[Message 112] Maya: "Easier said than done."
[Message 113] Liam: "True."
[Message 114] Chloe: "Hey, I'm going to go for a walk. Need to clear my head."
[Message 115] Maya: "Okay, be careful."
[Message 116] Liam: "Yeah, stay safe."
[Message 117] Chloe: "Will do. Talk to you later."
[Message 118] Maya: "Bye."
[Message 119] Liam: "Later."
[Message 120] Liam: "I keep thinking about Alex. Wonder what he was doing at the hotel so early?"
[Message 121] Maya: "I have no idea. He was a 10. Social Worker, maybe he was helping someone there?"
[Message 122] Liam: "Maybe. Or maybe he met someone there."
[Message 123] Maya: "Someone he knew? Or a stranger?"
[Message 124] Liam: "So many questions."
[Message 125] Maya: "Too many. It's overwhelming."
[Message 126] Liam: "Tell me about it."
[Message 127] Maya: "I just hope they find the person responsible. They're going away for a long time for this"
[Message 128] Liam: "Me too. Justice for Alex."
[Message 129] Maya: "Absolutely."
[Message 130] Liam: "I'm going to try and get some sleep. This is exhausting."
[Message 131] Maya: "Yeah, me too. Night, Liam."
[Message 132] Liam: "Night, Maya."
[Message 133] Maya: "Actually, one more thing. Chloe mentioned David wanted a promotion Alex got, but I remember Chloe wanted that promotion too...just thinking out loud."
[Message 134] Liam: "Interesting..."
[Message 135] Liam: "I didn't know that about Chloe. She seemed so upset. "
[Message 136] Maya: "People hide things, Liam. This case is a reminder of that."
[Message 137] Liam: "A harsh one for sure."
[Message 138] Maya: "I think so too."
[Message 139] Liam: "We should rest and see if the police catch the murderer."
[Message 140] Maya: "Yeah that sounds good. See you tomorrow."

[Message 1] Sarah: "Hey Mark, you here yet?"
[Message 2] Mark: "Yeah, just walked in. Studio B, right?"
[Message 3] Sarah: "Yep. Big mess."
[Message 4] Mark: "Mess? What kind of mess?"
[Message 5] Sarah: "The kind that's… inconvenient."
[Message 6] Mark: "Inconvenient like… we can't rehearse?"
[Message 7] Sarah: "Worse."
[Message 8] Mark: "Worse how?"
[Message 9] Sarah: "It's... gone."
[Message 10] Mark: "Gone? What's gone?"
[Message 11] Sarah: "The… you know."
[Message 12] Mark: "No, I *don't* know, Sarah. Be specific!"
[Message 13] Sarah: "The package. The one from… Zurich."
[Message 14] Mark: "Zurich? What Zurich?"
[Message 15] Sarah: "Ugh, seriously? The costumes! For the competition!"
[Message 16] Mark: "Oh. Those."
[Message 17] Sarah: "Yes, *those*. They're not here."
[Message 18] Mark: "Not here? You're sure?"
[Message 19] Sarah: "Pretty sure a whole box of sequined nightmares isn't hiding under the ballet barre."
[Message 20] Mark: "Nightmares is right."
[Message 21] Sarah: "So, what do we do?"
[Message 22] Mark: "Do? I don't know, look harder?"
[Message 23] Sarah: "I've been looking for an hour! Lisa's going to kill us."
[Message 24] Mark: "Lisa knows they were supposed to be here today?"
[Message 25] Sarah: "She was expecting them. Big time."
[Message 26] Mark: "Okay, deep breaths. Let's retrace steps."
[Message 27] Sarah: "Whose steps? Mine? Because I haven't taken any since panicking."
[Message 28] Mark: "Okay, good point. When was the last time you *saw* it?"
[Message 29] Sarah: "Never. That's the problem. It was supposed to be delivered this morning."
[Message 30] Mark: "Okay, so maybe the delivery guy…"
[Message 31] Sarah: "Maybe he delivered it to the wrong studio? You think?"
[Message 32] Mark: "Possible. Studio A?"
[Message 33] Sarah: "Worth a shot. I'll check."
[Message 34] Mark: "I'll look around here again. Just in case."
[Message 35] Sarah: "Okay, meet back here in five?"
[Message 36] Mark: "Sounds good."
[Message 37] Sarah: "..."
[Message 38] Mark: "..."
[Message 39] Sarah: "Nope. Nothing in Studio A."
[Message 40] Mark: "Damn. Nothing here either."
[Message 41] Sarah: "So… we tell Lisa?"
[Message 42] Mark: "We have to, right?"
[Message 43] Sarah: "I’m not looking forward to it."
[Message 44] Mark: "Me neither. Maybe… maybe it'll still turn up?"
[Message 45] Sarah: "Hopeful thinking. You know how she gets."
[Message 46] Mark: "Tell me about it."
[Message 47] Sarah: "Should we call the delivery company?"
[Message 48] Mark: "Definitely. I'll get the tracking number."
[Message 49] Sarah: "Okay. I’ll... I’ll wait here."
[Message 50] Mark: "Alright."
[Message 51] Sarah: "..."
[Message 52] Mark: "Got it. Says 'delivered at reception.'"
[Message 53] Sarah: "Reception? I was there all morning. I didn't see anything!"
[Message 54] Mark: "Well, that's what it says."
[Message 55] Sarah: "This is getting weirder by the minute."
[Message 56] Mark: "Tell me about it."
[Message 57] Sarah: "Did you see anything… unusual?"
[Message 58] Mark: "Unusual? Like what?"
[Message 59] Sarah: "I don't know… someone moving something big?"
[Message 60] Mark: "No. Just the usual Tuesday morning chaos."
[Message 61] Sarah: "Ugh."
[Message 62] Mark: "What?"
[Message 63] Sarah: "Just thinking..."
[Message 64] Mark: "Thinking what?"
[Message 65] Sarah: "Never mind. Not important."
[Message 66] Mark: "If it's about the package, it's important, Sarah."
[Message 67] Sarah: "It's just… Remember how chummy David was with the delivery guy last week?"
[Message 68] Mark: "David? What's he got to do with this?"
[Message 69] Sarah: "I don't know! Just... a thought."
[Message 70] Mark: "David wouldn't…"
[Message 71] Sarah: "Wouldn't what? Sabotage us? You sure?"
[Message 72] Mark: "I... I don't know what to think anymore."
[Message 73] Sarah: "Me neither. Okay, new plan. You call Lisa, I'll "casually" ask David if he saw anything."
[Message 74] Mark: "Casually? Good luck with that."
[Message 75] Sarah: "Hey, I can be subtle when I need to be."
[Message 76] Mark: "Right. And I can fly."
[Message 77] Sarah: "Just make the call, Mark."
[Message 78] Mark: "Fine, fine. Wish me luck."
[Message 79] Sarah: "You'll need it."
[Message 80] Mark: "..."
[Message 81] Sarah: "Okay, David said he didn't see anything."
[Message 82] Mark: "And you believe him?"
[Message 83] Sarah: "I have no idea. He seemed… nervous."
[Message 84] Mark: "Nervous how?"
[Message 85] Sarah: "Just… shifting around, avoiding eye contact. You know."
[Message 86] Mark: "Great. So now we have a suspect."
[Message 87] Sarah: "Maybe. Or maybe he's just always awkward."
[Message 88] Mark: "True. What did Lisa say?"
[Message 89] Sarah: "Not good. She’s on her way here."
[Message 90] Mark: "Oh, boy."
[Message 91] Sarah: "Yeah. She said something about… consequences."
[Message 92] Mark: "Consequences? What kind of consequences?"
[Message 93] Sarah: "I don't know! She just sounded really, really mad."
[Message 94] Mark: "Well, this is just great."
[Message 95] Sarah: "Tell me about it."
[Message 96] Mark: "So, we're dead?"
[Message 97] Sarah: "Potentially."
[Message 98] Mark: "Maybe we should run away to Zurich."
[Message 99] Sarah: "With what costumes?"
[Message 100] Mark: "Good point."
[Message 101] Sarah: "Here she comes…"
[Message 102] Mark: "Oh, crap."
[Message 103] Sarah: "..."
[Message 104] Mark: "..."
[Message 105] Sarah: "Brace yourself."
[Message 106] Mark: "I am."

[Message 1] Alex: Hey everyone! So glad we could finally meet up. How was your day?
[Message 2] Jamie: Mine was… eventful. Teacher-student conference. Need I say more?
[Message 3] Sam: Oh dear, Jamie! Hope everything is okay. Mine was alright, pretty standard sales calls.
[Message 4] Alex: Same here, Sam. Long day of calls. Feeling the sunset, though, this is nice.
[Message 5] Jamie: This restaurant booth is cozy. Okay, so, gardening plans anyone?
[Message 6] Sam: Yes! I've been wanting to ask you both. My tomatoes are NOT happy campers.
[Message 7] Alex: Tomatoes can be tricky! Too much water, not enough sun… the drama.
[Message 8] Jamie: Exactly! Speaking of drama, the teacher-student conference was… memorable. Little Timmy decided finger-painting the principal was a good idea.
[Message 9] Sam: Oh my goodness, Jamie! You have my sympathy!
[Message 10] Alex: Wow, Jamie, that's a story! Back to tomatoes – Sam, what kind are you growing?
[Message 11] Sam: Just your basic Roma, I think. Nothing fancy.
[Message 12] Jamie: Roma are usually pretty hardy. Maybe the soil? Have you tested it lately?
[Message 13] Alex: Good point, Jamie. Soil pH is key.
[Message 14] Sam: I haven't tested it recently, no. Where do you even get those kits?
[Message 15] Jamie: Any garden center should have them, Sam. Even some hardware stores.
[Message 16] Alex: Yeah, or online. Amazon has everything, unfortunately.
[Message 17] Sam: True. I'll grab one this weekend.
[Message 18] Jamie: So, Alex, what are you planting this year? Anything exciting?
[Message 19] Alex: I'm attempting a herb garden. Rosemary, thyme, basil… the works!
[Message 20] Sam: Ooh, fancy! I always kill herbs.
[Message 21] Jamie: Me too, Sam. Except mint. Mint takes over the world.
[Message 22] Alex: Haha, so true about the mint! I'm keeping it contained in a pot this time.
[Message 23] Sam: Smart move. I planted it directly in the ground once. HUGE mistake.
[Message 24] Jamie: Learned that the hard way myself.
[Message 25] Alex: Anyone seen that dancing show on TV lately? "Dance Revolution"?
[Message 26] Sam: Can't say that I have, Alex. I prefer a good book.
[Message 27] Jamie: I've seen a few episodes. Pretty impressive! I prefer singing, though. Karaoke night is my jam.
[Message 28] Alex: Karaoke! Fun! I’m more of a dance floor kind of person.
[Message 29] Sam: You two are so full of energy! I need a nap just thinking about it.
[Message 30] Jamie: Age is just a number, Sam! Plus, you’re only… well, you’re older than us. ;)
[Message 31] Alex: Jamie! Be nice!
[Message 32] Sam: I'm used to it. Back to gardening… any tips for keeping squirrels away? They're eating my strawberries!
[Message 33] Jamie: Ah, the eternal struggle!
[Message 34] Alex: I've heard sprinkling cayenne pepper around works.
[Message 35] Sam: Does that hurt the plants?
[Message 36] Jamie: Not usually, Sam. Just don't overdo it.
[Message 37] Alex: You can also try netting. Annoying to set up, but effective.
[Message 38] Sam: Netting might be the way to go. Thanks, guys!
[Message 39] Jamie: No problem! Happy to help. So, back to Timmy and the finger paint…
[Message 40] Alex: Oh dear, Jamie! Tell us more!
[Message 41] Sam: Yes, I'm morbidly curious.
[Message 42] Jamie: Okay, so the principal...Mrs. Henderson...was not amused.
[Message 43] Alex: I can imagine!
[Message 44] Sam: I'm picturing the scene in my head.
[Message 45] Jamie: It wasn't pretty. Timmy thought it was art, Mrs. Henderson saw… disrespect.
[Message 46] Alex: There's a fine line, isn't there?
[Message 47] Sam: Indeed. So, Jamie, what was the outcome? Detention? Suspension?
[Message 48] Jamie: Thankfully, just a strongly worded conversation with his parents. And a lot of apologies.
[Message 49] Alex: Phew! That could have been worse.
[Message 50] Sam: Definitely. Back to less stressful topics… anyone try that new bakery downtown?
[Message 51] Jamie: Oh, I did! "Sweet Surrender"? Their croissants are amazing.
[Message 52] Alex: I've heard good things! I need to check it out.
[Message 53] Sam: Maybe we should all go together sometime.
[Message 54] Jamie: I'm in!
[Message 55] Alex: Sounds like a plan!
[Message 56] Sam: Okay, back to my sad tomatoes... besides the soil, any other ideas?
[Message 57] Jamie: Are they getting enough sunlight? Tomatoes need a LOT.
[Message 58] Alex: And are you fertilizing them?
[Message 59] Sam: They're in a pretty sunny spot, I think. And I haven't fertilized them in a while…
[Message 60] Jamie: That could be it! Tomatoes are hungry plants.
[Message 61] Alex: Definitely give them some fertilizer. Tomato-specific is best.
[Message 62] Sam: I'll pick some up with the soil testing kit.
[Message 63] Jamie: Perfect! You'll have delicious tomatoes in no time.
[Message 64] Alex: Hopefully! Gardening is all about patience, isn't it?
[Message 65] Sam: So true. I always get impatient and then things go wrong.
[Message 66] Jamie: Same! I'm trying to be better about that this year.
[Message 67] Alex: Me too! Although my impulsivity doesn't always help.
[Message 68] Sam: Well, at least you're honest!
[Message 69] Jamie: We all have our flaws, Alex! Resilience is key, though!
[Message 70] Alex: True, Jamie! True!
[Message 71] Sam: Has anyone seen that documentary about bees lately?
[Message 72] Jamie: Oh, I think I saw a trailer for it. Is it good?
[Message 73] Alex: I haven't seen it, but I love bees! They're so important for gardening.
[Message 74] Sam: That's what I was thinking. We need to protect them.
[Message 75] Jamie: Absolutely! Plant bee-friendly flowers.
[Message 76] Alex: Yes! Lavender, sunflowers, borage…
[Message 77] Sam: I’ll have to look up a list.

[Message 79] Alex: Oh, good tip, Jamie!
[Message 80] Sam: Excellent. Thanks!
[Message 81] Jamie: You're welcome! So, anyone have any exciting weekend plans? Besides gardening, of course.
[Message 82] Alex: I'm going dancing on Saturday night!
[Message 83] Sam: Oh, fun! Where are you going?
[Message 84] Alex: That new place downtown, "The Groove."
[Message 85] Jamie: Sounds like a blast! I might hit up karaoke night at "The Rusty Mug."
[Message 86] Sam: You two are always out having fun! I'll probably just be reading.
[Message 87] Alex: Nothing wrong with that, Sam!
[Message 88] Jamie: Exactly! Sometimes a quiet night is just what you need.
[Message 89] Sam: True. Although, I do get a little stir-crazy sometimes.
[Message 90] Alex: Maybe try a new book genre?
[Message 91] Jamie: Or try singing along to some music while you read! Two birds, one stone!
[Message 92] Sam: Haha! Maybe.
[Message 93] Alex: Alright, I should probably head out soon. Got a big day tomorrow.
[Message 94] Jamie: Me too. Need to mentally prepare for another day of… Timmy.
[Message 95] Sam: I completely understand.
[Message 96] Alex: Thanks for the company, everyone! And the gardening tips!
[Message 97] Jamie: You too, Alex! It was great catching up.

[Message 99] Alex: Will do! See you both soon!
[Message 100] Jamie: Bye, Alex!
[Message 101] Sam: Goodbye, Alex.
[Message 102] Jamie: So, Sam, anything else you're planting besides tomatoes and strawberries?
[Message 103] Sam: I was thinking about some peppers. Maybe some bell peppers and some jalapenos.
[Message 104] Jamie: Ooh, nice! Jalapenos are always a good idea.
[Message 105] Sam: I like to make salsa.
[Message 106] Jamie: Homemade salsa is the best!
[Message 107] Sam: I agree!
[Message 108] Jamie: Well, I should probably head out too. It's getting late.
[Message 109] Sam: Alright. Thanks for the gardening advice, Jamie.
[Message 110] Jamie: You're welcome, Sam! Anytime. And thanks for listening to my Timmy stories.
[Message 111] Sam: Of course! They're quite entertaining.
[Message 112] Jamie: Haha! Good night, Sam!
[Message 113] Sam: Good night, Jamie. Drive safely.
[Message 114] Jamie: I will!
[Message 115] Sam: I think I will try reading something else tonight. Maybe a mystery novel.
[Message 116] Sam: It's been a while since I delved into that genre.
[Message 117] Sam: I need to be more open to new things.
[Message 118] Sam: I also need to start walking more.
[Message 119] Sam: It's been such a sedentary lifestyle lately.
[Message 120] Sam: I think the garden will help with that.
[Message 121] Sam: Fresh air and sunshine will do me good.
[Message 122] Sam: I'm looking forward to seeing my tomatoes thrive.
[Message 123] Sam: And hopefully those strawberries will produce a nice harvest.
[Message 124] Sam: Maybe I'll even try making some jam.
[Message 125] Sam: That would be a fun project.
[Message 126] Sam: I should research jam-making techniques.
[Message 127] Sam: I think I have some old jars in the basement.
[Message 128] Sam: I hope they're still good.
[Message 129] Sam: I should probably check on them soon.
[Message 130] Sam: I might also need to buy some new lids.
[Message 131] Sam: I think they sell them at the hardware store.
[Message 132] Sam: I really hope this works out.
